name: [Prototype] Hex Harvest
description:
Hex Harvest 

Hex Harvest is a Match-3 like resources gathering game.

How to play

Click on a hex tile to selected it's adjacent tiles. Drag one of the highlighted tiles to rotate the whole selection clockwise or counterclockwise.
Move matching types next to each other to harvest them. For example move the wood  tiles next to the axe worker tile.
Once you've harvested a tile move the castle next to it in order to remove and score this tile
Roads can connected worker and resources tiles as well as the castle tile with harvested resources.
Fill up the for cards on the bottom to gain more turns and finish the game before your turns run out.
